org.apache.flink.api.common.state

接口 StateBinder

  • 所有已知实现类:
    ImmutableStateBinder

    @Internal
public interface StateBinder
    The StateBinder is used by StateDescriptor instances to create actual State objects.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 已过时的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      <IN,ACC,OUT>
      AggregatingState<IN,OUT>      		 createAggregatingState(AggregatingStateDescriptor<IN,ACC,OUT> stateDesc)
      Creates and returns a new AggregatingState.
      <T,ACC> FoldingState<T,ACC> createFoldingState(FoldingStateDescriptor<T,ACC> stateDesc)
      已过时。 
      will be removed in a future version in favor of AggregatingState
      <T> ListState<T> createListState(ListStateDescriptor<T> stateDesc)
      Creates and returns a new ListState.
      <MK,MV> MapState<MK,MV> createMapState(MapStateDescriptor<MK,MV> stateDesc)
      Creates and returns a new MapState.

      Creates and returns a new ReducingState.

    • 方法详细资料

      • createValueState

        <T> ValueState<T> createValueState(ValueStateDescriptor<T> stateDesc)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates and returns a new ValueState.
        类型参数:
        T - The type of the value that the ValueState can store.
        参数:
        stateDesc - The StateDescriptor that contains the name of the state.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • createListState

        <T> ListState<T> createListState(ListStateDescriptor<T> stateDesc)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates and returns a new ListState.
        类型参数:
        T - The type of the values that the ListState can store.
        参数:
        stateDesc - The StateDescriptor that contains the name of the state.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • createReducingState

        <T> ReducingState<T> createReducingState(ReducingStateDescriptor<T> stateDesc)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates and returns a new ReducingState.
        类型参数:
        T - The type of the values that the ReducingState can store.
        参数:
        stateDesc - The StateDescriptor that contains the name of the state.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • createAggregatingState

        <IN,ACC,OUT> AggregatingState<IN,OUT> createAggregatingState(AggregatingStateDescriptor<IN,ACC,OUT> stateDesc)
                                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates and returns a new AggregatingState.
        类型参数:
        IN - The type of the values that go into the aggregating state
        ACC - The type of the values that are stored in the aggregating state
        OUT - The type of the values that come out of the aggregating state
        参数:
        stateDesc - The StateDescriptor that contains the name of the state.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • createFoldingState

        @Deprecated
<T,ACC> FoldingState<T,ACC> createFoldingState(FoldingStateDescriptor<T,ACC> stateDesc)
                                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        已过时。 will be removed in a future version in favor of AggregatingState
        Creates and returns a new FoldingState.
        类型参数:
        T - Type of the values folded into the state
        ACC - Type of the value in the state
        参数:
        stateDesc - The StateDescriptor that contains the name of the state.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • createMapState

        <MK,MV> MapState<MK,MV> createMapState(MapStateDescriptor<MK,MV> stateDesc)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates and returns a new MapState.
        类型参数:
        MK - Type of the keys in the state
        MV - Type of the values in the state
        参数:
        stateDesc - The StateDescriptor that contains the name of the state.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception
